briefTitle: Effects of Anorexia Nervosa on Bone Mass in Adolescents
officialTitle: Effects of Anorexia Nervosa on Peak Bone Mass

interventions.name: Physiologic Estrogen/progesterone
otherNames: Bone age >=15: Vivelle Dot patch with cyclic Provera

summary: This study is to determine the effects of anorexia nervosa on bone mass and hormone levels in adolescents. Whether administration of estrogen, a normal hormone present during puberty, can help maintain bone development in girls with anorexia nervosa will be determined.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change in Spine Bone Density Over the Study Duration (18 Months)
